website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-follow study guide that makes a nice addition to text books and other tools aimed at helping you pass the GMAT exam.
pros: Format is well-organized, making the material easy to study
Includes practice test questions that give you a good idea of what to expect when you take the real GMAT exam
cons: Not the most comprehensive study guide, so you may want to use it as one component to your other study materials

customer_reviews.title: Beware wrong answers, easier than the real GMAT
customer_reviews.text: Some of the answers are literally just wrong, particularly in the 2nd test’s integrated reasoning section. They also don’t offer great essay section help (have no sample essays to look at nor any explanation on what your practice essay should look like. It feels irresponsible to sell a test-prep book with flaws and I’m unsure where all the 5 star reviews came from. It’s frustrating to sweat over one of the practice tests and then to have an insufficient answer group. After buying the book I took practice tests on the GMAT official website. The books tests are significantly easier and not a good indicator of how the test will appear. The overwhelmingly positive reviews for this review are baffling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great study guide
customer_reviews.text: I love this study guide! I worked all (ok, most) of the problems and then did them again with the guided answers sections. It goes through each solution step-by-step which is extremely helpful!
customer_reviews.author: KT Hurta

customer_reviews.title: Insightful and Greatly Helpful!
customer_reviews.text: The GMAT Prep Book 2019 & 2020 is a well thought out and concise overview of test taking strategies for success on the Graduate Management Admission Test. I found the instructional sections were great for reviewing concepts that I had learned in High School and College. I completed my undergraduate education four years ago so the math review section was extremely helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Precise Contents
customer_reviews.text: The book is great. It gave me a lot of perspective on the GMAT exam. I hadn't really studied for GMAT before this book but it has helped me quite a bit on how I want to prepare for the exam.
customer_reviews.author: lpradhan

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, comprehensive!
customer_reviews.text: The study guide is helpful and comprehensive. I liked that the sections were concise but all-inclusive and the size of the guide overall is not too large.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Householder

customer_reviews.title: Great layout!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing study guide and clear layout! Would love if this book had more questions and explanations as to not act as a supplement to other company’s books
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: You may want to use this book as one of many
customer_reviews.text: This book summarizes what I need to know & to expect for this coming June exam. This guides & explains every section very simple & detailed
customer_reviews.author: Tessy MacClain

customer_reviews.title: Not so challenging
customer_reviews.text: The questions here are not as challenging as the real thing
customer_reviews.author: Fabiola Richards

customer_reviews.title: Great for high level conceptual review.
customer_reviews.text: Solid overview of concepts tested on the GMAT, but, available practice tests and level of detail left something to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great test prep!
customer_reviews.text: this book prepared me thoroughly across all sections, gave in depth feedback and reviews wrong and correct answers!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great resource!
customer_reviews.text: Great book that helped me do well on GMAT !
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Worst Study Guide for the GMAT!
customer_reviews.text: The study guide had little to no questions that helped with integrated reasoning or the quantative portion of the exam. Furthermore nearly 2/3 of the questions on the exam we're not covered by this book. It is an absolute waste of money and time. If I could rate this book Zero stars I would do it. I would also recommend Kaplan study guides over this in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R Davis

customer_reviews.title: This prep book is perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: This prep book is perfect!!! Not only does this book walk you through what you will see on the exam, the book also offers 2 practice tests you can take and evaluate your areas of opportunity. Please don’t skip over the test taking strategies. There is an abundance of essential information in this section. This book is worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST GMAT
customer_reviews.text: This 2019 study guide is awesome! This book doesn’t straight away jump into text question or anything of the sort. This guide explains the necessary factors you need to not only raise your score but also excell. It not only shows you how to solve for the answer but also gives you tips for yourself to take before studying, how to study, what to do before test day, and what to on test day.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great studies and prep work
customer_reviews.text: This book is crammed full of useful stuff to help you prepare for your test. It covers everything you find on the test and ensures you feel confident before you go in. Super well built and very handy for studying on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Clear, informative, and practical review
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed at how clearly the information is presented in this review. I found the intro to the GMAT to be interesting as it compares with the GRE. A study prep plan is included, a through run through on each area is covered. It is a good way to refresh one’s memory. Sample problems with detailed answers are included as well. It takes the guess work out of what will be covered on the GRE.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Dambacher

customer_reviews.title: Book is small but full of information
customer_reviews.text: The book is much smaller than other GMAT books. However, it is chocked full of great study ideas and things to help study for the GMAT. I doubt this should be your only source.
customer_reviews.author: jennyofaye

customer_reviews.title: Awesomely Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot of methods to prepare for my GMAT. A lot! This is hands down the book you need to score well on your GMAT. It is easy to follow. It is easy to read. Great book!
customer_reviews.author: HappyHexagon

customer_reviews.title: Great for self studying
customer_reviews.text: This book helped when I was studying to take a GMAT practice test on babson.edu. I studied with only this book and I was able to know and understand every question on the practice test.
customer_reviews.author: A5473927reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great college material
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who may be interested in dual enrollment from high school to further and speed up their education the GMAT study guide is a great start
customer_reviews.author: Keke

customer_reviews.title: Very Thorough
customer_reviews.text: I love this book. It is set up in a way that is easy to understand and you get manage to get through all of it timely.
customer_reviews.author: AngelaT

customer_reviews.title: Key Strategies for test taking
customer_reviews.text: Great study guide. The 15 test taking strategies are a great tool for anyone with test anxieties. This test prep book covers key points for the GMAT test.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Read, Very Informative
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this book to my cousin for study and he loved it. He started that the material is easy to understand and not a boring read.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: This book is really helpful, it has plenty of test questions and explanations specially for math
customer_reviews.author: juan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GMAT RESOURCE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great GMAT PREP Resource! I especially find the Verbal Section of the book very helpful. It definitively increase my reading comprehension skills and help build my confidence in tackling the verbal section of the GMAT! The math section of the book is also helpful! Thank you for the great resource!
customer_reviews.author: Ervin N Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Review Guide
customer_reviews.text: Great book! I wish I would have had this book before I took my test. It would have been a great help.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Along with all the practice questions, there are many pictures
customer_reviews.text: I love how this study guide has many practice questions.
customer_reviews.author: trussell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product- GMAT PREP Book
customer_reviews.text: The GMAT Prep Book explains the exam and the relevant information shows what is expected on the exam. The information is an easy read with offers for test taking strategies included in a DVD offer.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Practise Test with Detailed Answer
customer_reviews.text: This is quite comprehensive book. The best part of the book is that it has a detailed explanations of both the practice tests.
customer_reviews.author: Gaurav Gupta

customer_reviews.title: GReat study guide
customer_reviews.text: The study guide is very helpful when studying for your GMAT.
customer_reviews.author: Catrenna Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Great prep book!
customer_reviews.text: This prep book is well organized and comprehensive. Definitely a keeper for GMAT Prep!
customer_reviews.author: Lovelabs

customer_reviews.title: Great first book to start Studying!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the book! Everything is easy to find and well organized
customer_reviews.author: Aura

customer_reviews.title: Get your money’s worth in this booklet
customer_reviews.text: If you need a great study guide for the GMAT exam you should definitely try out this booklet. Great and concise questions to help prepare for the post graduate exam.
customer_reviews.author: Dez Sherrod

customer_reviews.title: Gamut of Information
customer_reviews.text: I am considering to further my education. This book provides the gamut of information one would need to surpass the GMAT test.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA B

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I found this guide to be very well organized. This should provide any prospective MBA student the confidence to take the GMAT.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great Guide!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the organization of the material, as well as the ease of use. I felt it gave great info regarding test taking strategies.
customer_reviews.author: Denice F.

customer_reviews.title: Informative
customer_reviews.text: It was very impressive, it had a lot of information and it covered a lot of ground work. I would highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Fransis H.

customer_reviews.title: A must for every GMAT taker!
customer_reviews.text: I personally like the GMAT reviewer. The information is systematically presented and well explained.
customer_reviews.author: I.f

customer_reviews.title: Great study guide!
customer_reviews.text: Very useful study guide, Helped me prepare for and pass my exam, would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Great resource...a must have if you really want to prepare yourself for the future
customer_reviews.author: AUBREY P MONGAL

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Guide
customer_reviews.text: This book has been really helpful to me. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: PANKAJ PAWAR

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to read and follow. It took my anxiety away!
customer_reviews.author: C. H.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This book is wonderful! It is full of useful information and will surely help any student pass the exam.
customer_reviews.author: Sachel Bise
